Package com.ibm.as400.access

Class DataStream

java.lang.Object
com.ibm.as400.access.DataStream
Direct Known Subclasses:
ClientAccessDataStream
public abstract class DataStream extends Object
Base class for data streams. Provides methods to access common data stream parts.
